title: Are you ready for a challenge? Join Grid Dynamics
text: Join our team of brilliant colleagues who are competent, innovative, disciplined and fearless.

title: Grid Dynamics in Poland
text: Meet the Grid Dynamics team in Krakow. Our team will share our values, culture, and more. Enjoy the video!

title: Grid Dynamics I We are Grid Dynamics
text: This year something changed in the whole world. We made the distance between us and our colleagues. With only one idea - to be on the safe side.
